Framework arguments:  -startup D:\eclipse\I0228\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar -showlocation
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -startup D:\eclipse\I0228\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar -debug -consolelog -console -showlocation

Steps to reproduce:
1) Create a compilation unit inside a project that is under CVS control.
2) Make a change to the unit, but don't save it
3) Go to the synchronize view and open this unit from the outgoing tree

You should get an error like this in the .log file:
Saveable ASTConverterTestAST3_2.java was not added using a saveables lifecycle event.
and a stack trace:
